objects.description: [Saint Bot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1018) has established persistence by being copied to the Startup directory or through the `\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run` registry key.(Citation: Malwarebytes Saint Bot April 2021)(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022 )
